input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Data Encryption Post-Update To Customer Support Team:

I am contacting you to report an unanticipated data encryption failure on my system. It might be linked to a recent software update. I have tried to address the issue by rebooting my system and reviewing the settings, but the encryption failure has not resolved.

The specific issue is:
Data encryption failed without warning.
Potential reason: Software update could be to blame.
Actions taken: Restarted system and checked configurations.

I would be immensely grateful if you could assist me in resolving this. Kindly inform me if there are any extra steps I should take or if you need further details to investigate My name is Jane Smith.. I am eagerly awaiting your response.

Thank you for your attention and assistance.

Sincerely,
[Your Name] You can reach me at fatima.farsi@help.com.
